nodes.text: The Nightsister energy lance was a rare polearm weapon used by Nightsisters of Dathomir, who wielded it with skill that could disarm or entangle opponent. Axkva Min was known to use such weapon. The energy lance had an electrical charge located within the core of the lance, Which caused great damage to opponents hit with it.

The Nightsister energy lance appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
